r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
**NOTE: We changed the way the service name can be configured. Now you must use `DD_SERVICE_NAME` instead of `DD_TRACE_APP_NAME` for consistency with other tracers. Usage of `DD_TRACE_APP_NAME` is now deprecated and will be removed in a future release.**
### Added - Support for Lumen 5.2+ #416 - Tracing support from the CLI SAPI #422 - Support for Laravel Artisan #422
### Changed - Now the way to configure service name is through `DD_SERVICE_NAME` instead of `DD_TRACE_APP_NAME` #432
